layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x84

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x52
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18

          LayoutText {#text} at (1,0) size 227x18
            text run at (1,0) width 227: "This box should have a thin border."
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0

        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 231x18
          text run at (0,0) width 231: "There should be no red on this line. "
